name: Name | Names
empty_description: There are no @.lower:{entityName} to display yet
empty_filtered_description: Try adjusting your search or filters to find what you're looking for.
create_summary_description: This area will display a summary of the data you add in this section.
dashboard_description: All amounts will be shown excluding VAT. If you keep this page open, your stats will update every 60 seconds.
feedback_error_description: Please refresh the page and try again. Contact support if the problem persists.
selector_stock_linking_word_or: and all products where stock is
selector_include_description: Quick add, or click browse to make a specific selection
selector_exclude_description: Exclude a brand, category, product etc. from your selection
selector_browse_description: Quick add, or click "Browse" to make a selection

dialog.unsaved_changes_description: All changes will be lost if you leave this page. Are you sure you want to leave?
dialog.delete_confirm_description: This will permanently delete this {entityName}. This action cannot be undone.
dialog.price_breaks_removed_title: Your applied price breaks will be removed!
dialog.price_breaks_removed_description: If you proceed changing price mode to {mode}, your globally applied price breaks will be removed.
dialog.product_prices_overwrite_description: If you proceed to apply and overwrite, all your manually added product prices in the table below will be overwritten.
dialog.volume_pricing_overwrite_title: Product volume pricing will be overwritten!
dialog.volume_pricing_overwrite_description: If you proceed to apply and overwrite, your manually added volume pricing for quantity {quantity} in the table below will be overwritten.
dialog.global_rule_remove_description: If you continue, your globally applied {ruleMode} of {percentage}% will be removed.
dialog.delete_shipping_address_description: Delete this shipping address from your account

error.404_description: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.
error.500_description: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.

auth.login_description: Use your credentials to log in.
auth.select_account_description: Select the account you want to access.
auth.invalid_credentials_description: Please check your email and password and try again.
auth.invalid_code_description: Please check the verification code and try again.
auth.reset_password_error_description: Your token is invalid or expired. Please try again.
auth.general_error_description: Please refresh this page and try again.
auth.password_reset_requested_description: Check your email for instructions to reset your password.
auth.password_reset_success_description: You can now log in with your new password.
auth.password_reset_error_description: Something went wrong while requesting reset link. Please try again.
auth.password_uppercase_required: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
auth.password_number_required: Password must contain at least one number
auth.password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters long
auth.password_requirements: Min. 8 characters, one uppercase, one digit
auth.forgot_password_description: Use your email to receive a reset link.
auth.new_to_geins: New to Geins Studio? Visit {link} to learn more and to get started.

table.column_options_description: Choose which columns you want to see in this list view

account_profile.username_change_note: Contact your administrator to change your username

contact_person_description: Contact person related to the address

customers.price_lists_description: Price lists connected to this company.
customers.orders_description: Orders placed by buyers connected to this company.
customers.buyers_feedback_existing_description: The provided email address ({email}) is already associated with an existing customer account.
customers.buyers_remove_description: This will remove the buyer from this company but keep its customer account
customers.buyers_assign_description: Toggle this if you want to assign this existing customer as a buyer and update it with the information above
customers.buyers_assign_price_lists_description: Chosen price lists will be applied when this buyer logs in
customers.buyers_price_list_priority_description: A price list assigned to a buyer will get the highest priority, meaning that enforced price lists on the company level will be overridden.
customers.buyers_restrict_to_price_lists_descripti: If disabled, this buyer can access all products available to the company
customers.use_billing_as_shipping: Use the billing address as your shipping address
customers.activate_different_shipping: Activate to add a different shipping address
customers.no_buyers_connected: No buyers are connected to this company
customers.vat_veis_valid: This VAT number was successfully validated using the {veis}.
customers.vat_veis_invalid: This number could not be validated using the {veis}. Manual review recommended.
customers.product_access_description: Controls which products this company can view and purchase
customers.product_access_restrict_description: If disabled, this company can access all products
customers.vat_settings_description: Set whether this company should be charged VAT on orders
customers.vat_included_description: Orders from this company will include VAT
customers.no_price_lists_connected: No price lists are connected to this company

pricing.price_list_vat_config_description: Set if the price list should be created with prices ex or inc VAT. Cannot be changed upon creation. Ex VAT prices are calculated from the VAT rate set on your default country set in Geins
pricing.price_list_enter_prices_ex_vat_descripti: Create this price list with prices ex VAT. Cannot be changed upon creation.
pricing.price_list_override_prices_description: If enabled, the price list's prices will be enforced and override lower available prices such as campaigns and sale prices.
pricing.price_list_auto_add_products_description: If enabled, products of selected categories or brands will be automatically added to the price list.
pricing.price_list_global_rules_description: Global rules apply to all products in the price list, including new products added.
pricing.price_list_rules_available_after_selecti: These settings will be available once you have made a product selection below.
pricing.price_list_global_volume_pricing_descrip: These price breaks apply to all products in this price list.
pricing.price_list_product_volume_pricing_descri: These price breaks apply only to this product. If you add a price break with the same quantity as a global break, it will override the global one.

workflows.title: Workflows
workflows.get_started: Get started by creating your first workflow
workflows.node_click_hint: Click on a node to view and edit its properties
workflows.drag_hint: Drag a node to the canvas or click to add at center
workflows.label: Label
